div.head: Molding stucco promptly
div.ab: Grind & pulverize finely brick or Armenian bole or sanguine & incorporate it with melted wax, & thus melted, cast like the others on a relief medal, & thus you will have a hollow form where you will be able to cast with plaster, pestled paper, or terre chimol√©e.
Finely sieved brick is better, because the bole is too fatty.
